build.name: [COLOR white][B]-- NEXUS IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED. PLEASE INSTALL K21 OMEGA --[/B][/COLOR]
build.description: 7o9 Builds are available for K21 Omega only

build.name: [COLOR dodgerblue]Welcome to 7o9's Build Menu[/COLOR]
build.description: 7o9 Builds

build.name: OneFlix
build.description: A widget packed Netflix style streaming service build - Debrid Only - Updated Mar-28-2025

build.name: Nimble
build.description: A light and quick Movie/TV build designed around the Nimbus skin. Includes a handful of top debrid add-ons. You choose your add-ons at first run. - Debrid Only - Updated Feb-1-2025

build.name: Retro
build.description: A light Movie/TV build with an old school look. Includes a handful of top add-ons - Debrid Only - Updated Sept-20-2024

build.name: Klix
build.description: A fully loaded build focusing on streaming services and LiveTV - Debrid Only - Updated Mar-28-2025

build.name: Game On
build.description: A sports only build. Nothing more! - Debrid Only - Updated Jan-24-2025

build.name: [COLOR dodgerblue]---- NetKlix Builds ----[/COLOR]

build.name: NetKlix Lite
build.description: This is a stripped down version of NetKlix - Low-end devices - Debrid Only - Updated Mar-24-2025

build.name: NetKlix
build.description: A Netflix clone. This is a complete streaming service replacement build - Requires at minimum, 1.2GB of available HDD space - For high-end devices. You've been warned! - Debrid Only - Updated Mar-24-2025

build.name: [COLOR dodgerblue]---- Estuary Builds ----[/COLOR]

build.name: Estuary Light
build.description: A minimal build designed around the Fen Light add-on with a Live TV section included- Debrid Only - Updated Mar-20-2025

build.name: Estuary Plus
build.description: A light build designed around TMDb Helper using a modded version of Kodi's stock Estuary skin. Includes a handful of top debrid add-ons. You choose your add-ons at first run. - Debrid Only - Trakt Required - Updated Mar-20-2025

build.name: Estuary Switch
build.description: Kodi's Estuary skin with a twist! Includes a handful of top debrid add-ons. - Debrid Only - Updated Mar-20-2025

build.name: EstuaryFlix
build.description: A simple Movie-TV build that is built for speed. No Bloat and a clean interface! Includes a handful of top debrid add-ons. - Debrid Only - Updated Updated Mar-20-2025
